text:
in the default publication, add a new "resource" document.
submit and publish it. it goes live|live.
now upload a new version. the document stays live|live.
in the live area, i still get the old version, so i'm pretty sure the workflow
state is not changed at all (as opposed to being automatically published, for
example).

it would seem that the wf:edit field in the menu.xsp does not make a difference.
who is supposed to handle the wf:* statements in the menu?
creator: nettings@apache.org
josias.thoeny@wyona.org
text:
fixed in r451921.

Now the class UploadResource.java invokes the workflow event 'edit'.

About the wf:event="edit" in menu.xsp, I don't know if this is still being used.
Is it obsolete? Does anybody know anything about that?
